Warehouse Keeper Stefano:
Security, speed and savings that's our motto! Are you sending a pie to your dear old granny back in your hometown? Perhaps an exquisitely crafted necklace to adorn the lovely neck of your fiancee? Large or small, expensive or cheap doesn't matter to us. You can deposit and send anything to anyone, anywhere!
Now then, did you write the name of the person who will receive this item? Please double-check it! No one else will be allowed to take this item!
